app.name: FloppyLoader
app.short_description: Loads homebrews from a floppy drive
app.long_description:
With this application you can load DOLs from a floppy drive!
Currently only the Amiga 1010 and 1011 are supported. You must connect it via the sensor bar connector, then insert your floppy with a single file named "boot.dol" and let FloppyLoader do the rest! * Press "A" to start * Press "HOME" to exit
NOTE: This application temporarily patches your IOS so HW_AHBPROT must be disabled (it is if your Homebrew Channel runs on the IOS 58).
It also works on the Wii U.
